inclusion.criterion: documented stool c. difficile toxin positivity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tolerate colonoscopy or nasogastric/nasoduodenal tube placement
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and Clostridium difficile toxin positivity. She has suffered symptomatic diarrhea and failed standard therapy for CDI.
